function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on labor-intensive environmental control measures for VBD control","Impact":"Inefficient vector control and increased risk of VBD transmission","Mitigation":"Adoption of technological solutions for vector control and habitat management","Technologies":"Modern insecticides, habitat modification technologies","People":"Population in areas with VBD transmission risk","Owner":"Health authorities, public health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of housing improvements for VBD prevention","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to VBD transmission among unprotected populations","Mitigation":"Implementation of housing improvements such as screening of doors and windows","Technologies":"Improved building materials, insect screens","People":"Vulnerable populations in malaria-endemic areas","Owner":"Local governments, housing authorities, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of vector ecology and behavior","Impact":"Unsuccessful or suboptimal vector control measures","Mitigation":"Investment in research and education on vector ecology, behavior, and control strategies","Technologies":"Entomological research tools, predictive modeling technologies","People":"Vector control specialists, researchers, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, universities"}]}
